comments.creator: e.g.hill@btinternet.com
comments.author: e.g.hill@btinternet.com
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; en-GB; rv:1.9.2.8) Gecko/20100722 Firefox/3.6.8
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; en-GB; rv:1.9.2.8) Gecko/20100722 Firefox/3.6.8

I tried to download the software but although I connected to the site Firefox couldn't connect to the file.

I ran Internet Explorer and I downloaded the file.

I tried to report the problem using the Help pulldown in Firefox but nneither of my computers can connect to the server.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.Log on to the Lite on website using the URL above
2.Locate the download link
3.Click on it.
Actual Results:  
Computer connected to the site but then firefox reported that it could not find the file.

Expected Results:  
Downloaded the file
